name: Scality S3
short_description: S3-compatible object storage server for self-hosted cloud storage.
description: S3-compatible object storage server for self-hosted cloud storage. Scality S3 is a self-hosted application focused on storage, s3, files, utility. It can be deployed on any device via Docker Compose. It supports a wide range of use cases for homelabs and self-hosted infrastructure.
usecases: Self-host Scality S3 on your home server to s3-compatible object storage server for self-hosted cloud storage without depending on third-party cloud services.
Use Scality S3 to manage your storage workflows privately, keeping all data under your control on local infrastructure.
